O that those whom the Lord has blessed with the treasures of truth would awake and say from the heart, "Lord, what wilt Thou have me to do?" Light is increasing to enlighten every soul who will diffuse the light to others. God will have His witnesses. We want men and women to settle in Australia who have a solid, Christlike influence. The burden of this work should not rest upon the conference wholly. Many 
                                                                           36
can come to this missionary field and improve in health, . . . and at the same time they can be educating others, and can have a moulding influence. O that many may be uprooted from where they are, to become workers with Jesus Christ.
